attributes.action: To allow motorcycle users to use all ULEZ area free of charge.
attributes.additional_details: You can never anticipate 100% on what traffic will be like during your journey. I strongly believe that I speak on behalf of all Motorcyclists and New Motorcyclists who will swap car or van to motorcycle in order to reduce daily costs of ULEZ use to work. We have been caught in costs for public roads using. Having use ULEZ free of charge in my opinion and experience, will substantially lower air pollution, our families and any member of London community being late for important journey.
attributes.background: I am a biker, van and car user in London and other public roads every day. Traffic in London is terrible and requires reducing. Although we, Motorcyclists do our very best on improving road traffic conditions and reducing time to get to work for everyone which is extra positive.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament. The Ultra Low Emission Zone (ULEZ) in London is the responsibility of the London Mayor and London Assembly.

The London Assembly has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here:

https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions
